## Checklist

- [ ] I searched existing issues/PRs.
- [ ] This request does not include sensitive information.

## Problem

What problem are you trying to solve? Describe the workflow or use case.

## Proposal

Outline the change you would like to see. Include API schema samples, importer
CLI flags, or data model changes if possible.

## Alternatives considered

List any other options you tried or considered (e.g., service-level fixes,
importer tweaks).

## Additional context

- Related issues or discussions  
- Notes about database migrations, importer prerequisites, or environment changes
